text: Motion
Motion

Oh, I really like the lyrics here, you know~
...There are discoveries even when you read them again.

Yeah, with a solid world view and stories scattered
throughout... It's like being enchanted.

At first, I thought it was difficult~
when I saw it for the first time, but...

...Somehow, I'm starting to understand~!
Thanks to studying with everyone~!

If only I could express these lyrics...
with my entire body...

Hmm
It might turn out pretty good, huh~

Yeah, that's right...!
Mm~ Let's re-energize ourselves again~!

Ahh, well done.
Seems like you're doing pretty well.

Hehe, thanks to you.
I'm starting to grasp some clues... I guess.

Well then, since the producer's here too,
shall we resume?

Wow...!
The atmosphere has really intensified, hasn't it...!

Hehe, yayy~~! ...But I accidentally
stepped forward during the chorus again...

In that case...
How about me and Yuika cover for you?

Yeah, I agree! Kogane,
you're great at keeping up the momentum!
...Um, can we... do it one more time...?
...Is it okay... to take another break?

Uh, yeah... I'm fine...
I want to... keep up with everyone...

Hmm
...Alright, shall we proceed then?

(The atmosphere among everyone is improving
...It's like the gears have started to turn.)
